description: 1 x Mature Pyracantha (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 6.50m: Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure approximately 1.20m. General maintenance.1 x Palm (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 6.00m: Remove 4 or 5 lower leaves. General maintenance.1 x Conifer (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 4.00m: Beneath hornbeam: Trim lateral and sub lateral growth to tidy by approximately 30 cm. General maintenance.1 x Apple (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 5.00m: Reduce crown spread and height back to previous and most recent reduction points, reducing overlong branches back into main crown structure By approximately 1.20m.  Thin crown density by 15%. Raise crown by approximately 0.50m. General maintenance.1 x Ornamental Pear (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 4.50m:  Remove dead wood in central crown. Lightly trim extraneous branches back into main crown structure by approximately 0.5m. Reduce crown growth which is extending towards sunlight back into main crown structure by approximately 1.00m.  General maintenance.Laurel/Privet/Lime & Hazel Hedge (applicants ref. G1) - Approximately 3.50m: Reduce by approximately 1.00m back to previous heights. General maintenance.Mixed species Laurel and Bay Hedge (applicants ref. G2) - Approximately 4.00m: Trim to reduce overhang back to previous points by approximately 1.20m. General maintenance.1 x Yew (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 4.00m: (Front of hedge: Trim to tidy by approximately 0.50m General maintenance.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
